strings.modalDescription: Please select a local unit type and upload the xlsx file
strings.modalImportPendingDescription: Your file is currently being processed. You can close this modal and check the result from the upload history
strings.uploadFileSectionDescription: Please make sure to select a supported file format (xlsx, xlsm) with size less than 10MB
strings.contentStructureDescription: The contents in the xlsx should follow the structure provided in {templateLink}.
strings.contentStructureNote: To enable multi-select functionality in certain fields, please click "Enable Macros" when prompted after opening the downloaded template file.
strings.importWarning: Please be aware that this action will replace all the existing local units of selected type! To avoid potential loss of data, please make sure to export the local units!
strings.noPermissionBothDescription: You don't have permission and this unit is not externally managed.
strings.noPermissionErrorDescription: You do not have the permission to upload local unit data
strings.noPermissionExternallyManaged: The selected local unit type is not externally managed, only externally managed local units can be bulk uploaded!
